name: MythBusters: The Game
storyline:
Utilize the full MythBusters Workshop, and explore other locations like the warehouse, MythBusters Hall, and the testing ground. Always a new myth to unlock- level up to test the next experiment. Be careful and prepared, because each experiment carries a huge risk. And remember: DON'T TRY THIS AT HOME!

Let yourself feel the scientific madness! Use the simplest items or complex machines. Plan your myths in the workshop and then move to the testing ground where you can check the validity of your thesis. Experience the amazing effects of your hard work and interesting ideas.
summary: Be a MythBuster in front and behind the camera! The game is a first-person sim that adapts the famous Discovery show. Run crazy experiments and manage the production of episodes.
